ibis.ipl.server
Class ServerConnection

java.lang.Object
  ibis.ipl.server.ServerConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerInterface
public class ServerConnection
extends Object
implements ServerInterface

Connection to a server in another JVM (possibly on another machine). Connection can be established either by connecting stdin/stdout to a server started with the "--remote" option, or by passing the address of the server.

Author:
Niels Drost

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

ServerConnection

public ServerConnection(InputStream stdout,
                        OutputStream stdin,
                        PrintStream output,
                        String outputPrefix,
                        long timeout,
                        ibis.smartsockets.virtual.VirtualSocketFactory socketFactory)
                 throws IOException
Creates a connection to the server with the given in and output stream. Will parse the address of the server from the standard out of the server process. Also forwards the output to the given stream (with an optional prefix to each line). When this connection is terminated, the (remote) server terminates as well.

Parameters:
stdout - Standard out of server process
stdin - Standard in of server process
output - Stream to forward output to
outputPrefix - Prefix to add to all lines of output
timeout - Number of milliseconds to wait for the server to become available
socketFactory - Socket factory to use for making connections. if null, a new factory will be created
Throws:
IOException - if the socket factory cannot be created

ServerConnection

public ServerConnection(String address,
                        ibis.smartsockets.virtual.VirtualSocketFactory socketFactory)
                 throws IOException
Creates a connection to the server at the given address.

Parameters:
address - address of the server
socketFactory - Socket factory to use for making connections. if null, a new factory will be created
Throws:
IOException - in case the socket factory cannot be created

ServerConnection

public ServerConnection(String address,
                        String hubs)
                 throws IOException
Connections to the server at the given address. A list of hubs to use to connect to the server must also be provided.

Parameters:
address - address of the server
hubs - list of hubs to use.
Throws:
IOException - in case the SocketFactory could not be created

end

public void end(long timeout)
         throws IOException
Description copied from interface: ServerInterface
Stops all services. May wait until the services are idle.

Specified by:
end in interface ServerInterface
Parameters:
timeout - timeout for ending all services in milliseconds. 0 == wait forever, -1 == not wait.
Throws:
IOException

closeConnection

public void closeConnection()
Closes connection to the server. Will also terminate server if stdin/stdout connection is used
